name: RTL
summary: Color highlighting for gcc rtl dumps
description: This plugin is the syntax file for rtl gcc dump which is useful for gcc debugging.
install_details:
1. Copy rtl.vim in your .vim/syntax directory
2. If you want Vim to detect the filetype, add to $VIM/filetype.vim:
au BufNewFile,BufRead *.c.* 	setf rtl
